TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Assess systems behaviour after Consumer restart within the Publish/Subscribe exchange pattern.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Producer is processing a subscription request from Consumer and providing update information as prescribed utilizing the Publish/Subscribe exchange mechanism. Consumer restarts. Data events occur on the Producer side during the 'outage'.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: MIP4SLT1_1231 - Current situation P/S nominal consumption established and working.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: Nominal restart. Assess (record) how systems behave if the Consumer restarts.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Producer (1) processes subscription request from Consumer (2) and provides update information as prescribed utilizing the Publish/Subscribe exchange mechanism.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumer (2) receives updates of subscription data.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Consumer restarts. Data events occur on the Producer side during the 'outage'.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Assess (record) how both systems, Producer and Consumer behave after Consumer's restart.
